title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
of innocent tieflings like Karlach. You will have the following dialogue options.

You warned me about Raphael, but are pacted to Mizora? What a fraud. The Blade of Frontiers has some explaining to do. What did you expect? She's a devil. Hardly the paragon of honesty. You've been tuned into a devil. An appropriate punishment, I'd say.

You can ask about the pact and how he got involved with Mizora and Wyll will approve.

Rescue Zariel's asset from Moonrise Towers.
